จะทำอย่างไรกับกลุ่มต่างๆ
Enable SponsorBlock (Beta
SponsorBlock is a crowd-sourced system for skipping annoying parts in YouTube videos
เปิดใช้งานการเพิ่มกลุ่มใหม่
เปิดสวิตช์นี้เพื่อเปิดใช้งานการเพิ่มกลุ่มทดลอง (มีปัญหาการมองเห็นปุ่ม)
เปิดใช้การโหวต
Switch this on to enable voting.
ทั่วไป
Adjusting new segment step
This is the number of milliseconds you can move when you use the time adjustment buttons while adding new segment
Change API URL
"The address SponsorBlock uses to make calls to the server. Don't change this unless you know what you're doing."
Enable SB Browser button
Clicking this button under the player will open sb.ltn.fi where you can see more details about segments.
Cache segments locally
Clear SponsorBlock segments cache
Frequently watched videos (eg. music videos) may store segments in app cache to make skipping segments faster
Minimum segment duration
Segments shorter than the set value (in seconds) will not be skipped or show in the player
Skip count tracking
This lets SponsorBlock leaderboard system know how much time people have saved. The extension sends a message to the server each time you skip a segment
แสดงขนมปังปิ้งเมื่อข้ามกลุ่มโดยอัตโนมัติ
Click to see an example toast
Show time without segments
This time appears in brackets next to the current time. This shows the total video duration minus any segments.
Your unique user id
This should be kept private. This is like a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you
Channel whitelisting
Use the Segments button under the player to whitelist a channel

"1. ต้องเปิด Google device registration และ Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) 2. Vanced จะต้องแสดงตามที่ลงทะเบียนภายใต้ GCM 3. สถานะปัจจุบันใน GCM จะต้องไม่ถูกตัดการเชื่อมต่อ 4. GCM -> ขั้นสูง (สามจุดบนขวา) และสลับช่วงเวลา ping Wi-Fi ไปมาหนึ่งครั้งเพื่อเชื่อมต่อ"
การตั้งค่า MicroG

แสดงให้ฉันดู
There are guidelines
Guidelines contain tips about submitting a segment
ดูคำแนะนำ
การตั้งค่า SponsorBlock
ใช้ API ของ sponsor.ajay.app
Endcards/Credits
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not spoken conclusions
Filler Tangent/Jokes
Tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video. This should not include segments providing context or background details
Intermission/Intro Animation
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, repeating animation
Music: Non-Music Section
Only for use in music videos. This includes introductions or outros in music videos
Preview/Recap
"Quick recap of previous episodes, or a preview of what's coming up later in the current video. Meant for edited together clips, not for spoken summaries."
Unpaid/Self Promotion
Similar to \"sponsor\" except for unpaid or self promotion. This includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with
สปอนเซอร์
Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements
Interaction Reminder (Subscribe)
When there is a short reminder to like, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content

Disable
Enable
Learn more
Return YouTube Dislike
This integration uses the RYD API from https://returnyoutubedislike.com. Tap to learn more
Return YouTube Dislike Integration

(WARNING! CURRENTLY IN ALPHA, You may not see dislike button appear if YouTube pushes a server side update to you) Want to enable Return YouTube Dislikes to see dislikes again? Your likes/dislikes will be sent to RYD API (anonymously) after enabling RYD integration. You can enable/disable this in the settings at any time.
Uses the RYD API
Return YouTube Dislike settings
Switch this on to see the dislike counts again
Enable RYD (ALPHA)
SponsorBlock
Are you aware of the SponsorBlock integration in Vanced? With it you can skip sponsored segments in the videos. You can enable/disable this in the settings at any time.
